{"id":882370031,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"6Â months","timestamp":1674306118,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"16 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/882370031/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"31.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int pivotIndex(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int indx = -1;\n        int leftsum = 0 , sum = 0;\n        for(auto it : nums)\n        {\n            sum += it;\n        }\n        for(int i = 0 ; i < nums.size() ; i ++)\n        {\n            if(sum - leftsum - nums[i] != leftsum)\n            {\n                leftsum += nums[i];\n            }\n            else\n            {\n                indx = i;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        return indx;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index","has_notes":false}
